channel.title: keys on Useful commands compiled by bikram990
channel.description: Recent content in keys on Useful commands compiled by bikram990

item.title: Openssl
item.description: Fetch certificate from a server openssl s_client -showcerts -servername <server hostname> -connect <server hostname>:443 </dev/null Example Example openssl s_client -showcerts -servername 'google.com' -connect 'google.com:443' </dev/null Create Create a Self Signed Root CA Create key pair openssl genrsa -des3 -out <key file>.key 2048 # or openssl ecparam -out <key file>.key -name prime256v1 -genkey Create CSR openssl req -new -sha256 -key <key file>.

item.title: Keytool
item.description: List List all items from a keystore keytool -list -noprompt -storepass <keystore password> -keystore <path to keystore> Example Example keytool -list -noprompt -storepass 'changeit' -keystore '/etc/pki/java/cacerts' List a particular item from a keystore keytool -list -noprompt -alias <alias of the item> -storepass <keystore password> -keystore <path to keystore> Example Example keytool -list -noprompt -alias 'globalsignrootr46' -storepass 'changeit' -keystore '/etc/pki/java/cacerts' -v Import Import a trust certificate keytool -import -trustcacerts -keystore <path to keystore> -storepass <keystore password> -noprompt -alias <alias for item> -file <certificate file> Example Example keytool -import -trustcacerts -keystore '/etc/pki/java/cacerts' -storepass 'changeit' -noprompt -alias 'mycert' -file 'cert.
